summary:
Marketing professional in the area of strategic marketing, data analytics and project management. Enthusiastic, eager to learn, willing to develop myself, always looking for improvements, passionate, loves to be challenged and a real team player. Loves to combine marketing and strategy in daily practices. 

Interested in my profile? Let’s share a cup of coffee!

certifications.name: Invloed op de Politiek Bestuurlijke Besluitvorming
Wijn & Spijs Cursus - Basis voor de Sommelier
Certificate of Participation in Social Media Challenge

projects.title: Social Media Challenge
projects.description:
Participated in Tilburg University’s Master-level course Research in Social Media
and contributed to solving the Social Media Challenge. The Social Media Challenge is an assignment using big data to understand consumer behavior in the live market of the Dutch music industry (in cooperation with Buma/Stemra, The Netherlands).

projects.title: Promotion Coordinator & Representative Asset at VvTE
projects.description: In the board of alumni association ‘VvTE’ I was responsible for the promotion of events and the cooperation of study association Asset and the VvTE. The VvTE is the 'Vereninging voor Tilburgse Economisten' and thereby the alumni association for former students of the Tilburg School of Economics and Management.

projects.title: Vice-chairman and Promotion Officer, Committee Marketing Event
projects.description: The Marketing Event committee is responsible for the organization of an annual marketing event related to a specific theme. Our theme was ‘non-traditional marketing’. Speakers where MarketingFacts, Achmea, Brand Design Experience and Aids Fonds.

projects.title: Member of Horst aan de Maas 2020
projects.description: The Committee ‘Horst aan de Maas 2020’ is a group consisting of all strata of society. Within this group, citizens, government and companies discuss several topics. Examples are the participation of citizens and the future business environment.

projects.title: Member of the Environmental Committee, Gemeente Horst aan de Maas
projects.description: The Environmental Committee is one out of two committees that supports the town council. Areas of interest are: ‘economy & tourism’,’ environment & habitation’.

projects.title: Member of the Society Committee, Gemeente Horst aan de Maas
projects.description: The Society Committee is one out of two committees that supports the town council. Areas of interest are: ‘quality of life and welfare’, ‘employment, incomes and care’, ‘finances, taxes and insurances’.

projects.title: Member of the Audit of Accounts
projects.description: The Audit of Accounts controls and supports the treasurer of ‘Essentie’.

projects.title: Vice-chairman of the Campaign Committee
projects.description: Responsibilities: implementation of various campaign activities, the judgment of campaign materials (e.g. flyers, posters) and directing and motivating the members of the electoral list .

projects.title: Member of the TIME (The International Marketing Expedition) Committee
projects.description: The International Marketing Expedition (TIME) is a project of study association Asset | Marketing, in collaboration with Tilburg University. The goal of TIME is to conduct international marketing research for Dutch companies in interesting, foreign markets. In 2013, the destination of TIME was Singapore and Malaysia. The responsibilities of participants consist of approaching companies, convincing them to invest in the project, writing a research proposal, doing field research abroad and finally writing the report and presenting the results to your company. During TIME, I did marketing research for a Dutch company called Secrid (www.secrid.com).

profile_positions.description: As a strategic project manager within the Partner Proposition team, I am responsible for setting up multidisciplinary and strategic projects to enhance the position of partners on our platform and accelerate their growth. I work alongside IT, logistics, marketing, communication, service, legal and sustainbility specialists to develop new propositions that contribute to the abovementioned goals. Our focus is on monitoring, defending and improving the partner proposition of bol.com.
profile_positions.title: Partner Proposition Manager

profile_positions.description: Within the Partner Marketing team responsible for the set-up, development, automation and improvement of trigger-based, personalized campaign flows. Our ultimate goal is to make sure that the assorment of our partners (who are selling products via our platform) matches the demands of our customers in terms of pricing, deliverability, content and service. Moreover, I am also responsible for designing and tracking KPIs, creating dashboards, stakeholder management with IT and analyzing large amounts of data to improve existing campaigns.
profile_positions.title: Database Marketeer / Marketing Data Analyst

profile_positions.description: Performing a master thesis research about the key drivers and predictors of online shopping cart abandonment. Why do customers abandon their online shopping carts and which innovations can be implemented to decrease the online shopping cart abandonment rate of bol.com? Besides doing a master thesis research, I am also participating in projects that enhance the shopping experience on bol.com.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Intern Shopping Experience

profile_positions.description: The department of Merchandise Development within bol.com focusses on improving the journey from customers on the website of bol.com. My main tasks are customer journey analysis, assisting in improving the quality and quantity of reviews/questions from customers and enhancing the navigation possibilities in the webshop.
profile_positions.title: Intern Merchandise Development

profile_positions.description:
ShoppingTomorrow is the annual research program in which research is conducted into the most important developments within digital commerce. Spread over approximately 25 expert groups, 500 to 600 e-commerce professionals participate in ShoppingTomorrow every year.

As a member of the Expert group Marketplaces we study the effect of a marketplace on the profitability of a business.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Marketplace Expert Group

profile_positions.description: In the board of alumni association ‘Vereniging van Tilburgse Economen', I am responsible for the promotion and organization of events for the alumni of the Tilburg School of Economics and Management.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Board

profile_positions.description: Writing marketing related blogs for the blog of Asset | Marketing which reaches over 4000 students, alumni, companies and others who are interested in marketing. Besides writing, also responsible for the presentation and interpretation of the Google Analytics data of Markethings.net. Before writing a blog, I will perform a decent research about the subjects, which are among others: online marketing, commercials, product placement, innovation and strategic marketing.
profile_positions.title: Blogger & Website Analyst Markethings.net

profile_positions.description: Study Association Asset | Marketing is the study association that serves all students studying at Tilburg University with an interest in marketing.
profile_positions.title: Member of Study Association Asset | Marketing

profile_positions.description:
My main responsibilities were to chair the weekly Board Meetings, to chair the
Department Members’ Meetings, to be the representative of Asset | Marketing, to keep an eye on the progress of our policy and to manage the six-headed board of Asset | Marketing. Besides I was also responsible for the organization of the Tilburg Marketing Thesis Awards and I was coordinating the National Marketing Battle (Nationale Marketing Strijd) and the Lustrum 2017 committee.
profile_positions.title: Chairman of the Board

profile_positions.description:
Development program for talents in Data & Analytics. Four weeks of full time training about the use of data in data-driven organizations, data preparation & transformation, methods & techniques, tooling and soft skills like conversation techniques, presenting, reporting and visualization of data.

Tools: SQL | MS Access | SPSS | PowerBI | MS Excel | R
profile_positions.title: Trainee Data & Analytics Talent Academy

profile_positions.description: Essentie is a local, pragmatic political party in the community of Horst aan de Maas.
profile_positions.title: Member of Political Party 'Essentie'

profile_positions.description: On behalf of the general board of Asset I was responsible for the coordination of the Events Committee, the Economic Business Weeks Tilburg and the Asset Conference. Besides I was also responsible for the alumni of study association Asset.
profile_positions.title: Events Coordinator & Alumni Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the accompaniment, support and coordination of the board of the National Marketing Battle (Nationale Marketing Strijd, NMS)
profile_positions.title: NMS Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the provision of information towards players and parents. Also responsible for detecting and solving (potential) problems between players, coaches and/or parents within the C-group. And finally, responsible for the organization of the annual winter activity.
profile_positions.title: Head of C - Group

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the activation of the Youth Community of Rabobank Horst Venray. Responsible for the preparation of meetings, organization of the business events INSPIRE 2015 and INSPIRE 2016. At these business events, several leading, regional companies presented themselves towards students and potential employees. Also responsible for the organization of several in-house days.
profile_positions.title: Chairman Youth Community Rabobank Horst Venray

volunteer_experiences.description: Realizing the best wishes for children that are very sick and their families and friends.

volunteer_experiences.role: Member of Economic Affairs and  Finance working group
volunteer_experiences.description: Advising the D66 politicians in the city council of Utrecht on economic affairs.

volunteer_experiences.role: Member of Digital and Binding Participation working groups
volunteer_experiences.description: Enhancing the understanding and development of digital and binding participation within the Dutch politcal party D66.

Together with many enthusiastic young professionals we try to come up with new refreshing ideas to collect more money for research into Alzheimer's disease. I am part of the #Oepsvergeten-team in which we try to connect and relate typical moments of forgetting something (like your keys or the birthday of your partner) with the typical forgetting of everyday things related to Alzheimer's disease.

At the Bart de Graaff foundation, I assist (young) entrepreneurs with a physical disability in setting up their company. I do this by helping them to create and work out a business plan and then translate this into concrete next steps.
Advising the current board of Asset Tilburg on their activities and policy.
Advising the board of Asset | Marketing on their activities and policy.
Advising and supporting the board of the 'Nationale Marketing Strijd' on their activities.
